verses.verse: Then we <S%H6437>turned,<s%> and took our <S%H5265>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me: and we <S%H5437>compassed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Ye have <S%H5437>compassed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> long <S%H7227>enough:<s%> <S%H6437>turn<s%> you <S%H6828>northward.<s%>

And <S%H6680>command<s%> thou the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H859>Ye<s%> are to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir;<s%> and they shall be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> you: take ye good heed unto yourselves <S%H8104>therefore:<s%> <S%H3966><s%>

Meddle <S%H1624><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> with them; <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you of their <S%H4480>land,<s%> <S%H776><s%> no, not so <S%H5704>much<s%> as a foot <S%H4096>breadth;<s%> <S%H3709><s%> <S%H7272><s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> unto <S%H6215>Esau<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>meat<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> them for <S%H3701>money,<s%> that ye may <S%H398>eat;<s%> and ye shall <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3739>buy<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> them for <S%H3701>money,<s%> that ye may <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thee in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hand:<s%> he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> thy walking <S%H1980>through<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath been <S%H5973>with<s%> thee; thou hast <S%H2637>lacked<s%> <S%H3808>nothing.<s%> <S%H1697><s%>

And when we passed <S%H5674>by<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> our <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> through the <S%H4480>way<s%> <S%H1870><s%> of the <S%H6160>plain<s%> from <S%H4480>Elath,<s%> <S%H359><s%> and from <S%H4480>Ezion-gaber,<s%> <S%H6100><s%> we <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H6696>Distress<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4124>Moabites,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H1624>contend<s%> with them in <S%H4421>battle:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> thee of their <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> for a <S%H3425>possession;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession.<s%>
The <S%H368>Emims<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein in times <S%H6440>past,<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1419>great,<s%> and <S%H7227>many,<s%> and <S%H7311>tall,<s%> as the <S%H6062>Anakims;<s%>
Which <S%H1992><s%> <S%H637>also<s%> were <S%H2803>accounted<s%> <S%H7497>giants,<s%> as the <S%H6062>Anakims;<s%> but the <S%H4125>Moabites<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> them <S%H368>Emims.<s%>

The <S%H2752>Horims<s%> also <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H6440>formerly;<s%> but the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3423>succeeded<s%> them, when they had <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their <S%H8478>stead;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H3425>possession,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto them.

Now <S%H6258><s%> rise <S%H6965>up,<s%> said I, and get you <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered.<s%> And we went <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered.<s%>

And the <S%H3117>space<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H1980>came<s%> from <S%H4480>Kadesh-barnea,<s%> <S%H6947><s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> we were come <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered,<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> were <S%H8552>wasted<s%> out from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> the <S%H4264>host,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto them.

For <S%H1571>indeed<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> against them, to <S%H2000>destroy<s%> them from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> the <S%H4264>host,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they were <S%H8552>consumed.<s%>

So it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> were <S%H8552>consumed<s%> and <S%H4191>dead<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%>
That the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Thou <S%H859><s%> art to pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853>through<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> this day: <S%H3117><s%>

And when thou comest <S%H7126>nigh<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> <S%H6696>distress<s%> them <S%H408>not,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H1624>meddle<s%> with them: <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> thee of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> any <S%H3425>possession;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession.<s%>

( <S%H1931>That<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> was <S%H2803>accounted<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7497>giants:<s%> <S%H7497>giants<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein in old <S%H6440>time;<s%> and the <S%H5984>Ammonites<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> them <S%H2157>Zamzummims;<s%>

A <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1419>great,<s%> and <S%H7227>many,<s%> and <S%H7311>tall,<s%> as the <S%H6062>Anakims;<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them; and they <S%H3423>succeeded<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their stead: <S%H8478><s%>

As <S%H834><s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> he <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2752>Horims<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them; and they <S%H3423>succeeded<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their <S%H8478>stead<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> day: <S%H3117><s%>

And the <S%H5757>Avims<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2699>Hazerim,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H5804>Azzah,<s%> the <S%H3732>Caphtorims,<s%> which came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Caphtor,<s%> <S%H3731><s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their <S%H8478>stead.)<s%>

Rise ye <S%H6965>up,<s%> take your <S%H5265>journey,<s%> and pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon:<s%> <S%H7200>behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and his <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, and <S%H1624>contend<s%> with him in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H6343>dread<s%> of thee and the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of thee <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H5971>nations<s%> that are <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8088>report<s%> of thee, and shall <S%H7264>tremble,<s%> and be in <S%H2342>anguish<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of thee.

And I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> out of the <S%H4480>wilderness<s%> <S%H4057><s%> of <S%H6932>Kedemoth<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> with <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Let me <S%H5674>pass<s%> through thy <S%H776>land:<s%> I will <S%H1980>go<s%> along by the <S%H1870>highway,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> I will <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5493>turn<s%> unto the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> nor to the <S%H8040>left.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H7666>sell<s%> me <S%H400>meat<s%> for <S%H3701>money,<s%> that I may <S%H398>eat;<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H3701>money,<s%> that I may <S%H8354>drink:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> I will pass <S%H5674>through<s%> on my <S%H7272>feet;<s%>

(As <S%H834><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> and the <S%H4125>Moabites<s%> which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H6144>Ar,<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto me;) <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> I shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> us.

But <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> let us <S%H5674>pass<s%> by him: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7185>hardened<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and made his heart <S%H553>obstinate,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3824><s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> he might <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into thy <S%H3027>hand,<s%> as appeareth <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H2490>begun<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and his <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee: <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3423>possess,<s%> that thou mayest <S%H3423>inherit<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H776>land.<s%>
Then <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> us, <S%H1931>he<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H4421>fight<s%> at <S%H3096>Jahaz.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> us; and we <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> him, and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And we <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5892>cities<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> and utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> the <S%H4962>men,<s%> and the <S%H802>women,<s%> and the little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> <S%H853><s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> we <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> to remain: <S%H8300><s%>
Only <S%H7535><s%> the <S%H929>cattle<s%> we took for a <S%H962>prey<s%> unto ourselves, and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H3920>took.<s%>

From <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H8193>brink<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> and from the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is by the <S%H5158>river,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> one <S%H7151>city<s%> too <S%H7682>strong<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> us: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6440>unto<s%> us:

Only <S%H7535><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> thou <S%H7126>camest<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> nor unto <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3027>place<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> nor unto the <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> nor unto <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>forbade<s%> us.
